description:
Shuuichi is Yuuko`s ex-boyfriend who works as a gym teacher. After some time in their relationship, Yuuko broke up with Shuuichi due to his abusive nature towards her; when this happened, Shuuichi didn`t want to accept these changes and started going after his former lover as well as raping her in order for her to accept him back into her life, which she incessantly refused.
After he rapes Yuuko another time, but this time using the mummified penis that Yuuko and Ayano were doing research on-(thinking that it was a sex toy); Yuuko becomes possessed and is turned into the Lust Demon. When Yuuko now fully possessed by the Lust Demon encounters Shuuichi, she has sex with him in his car with Shuuichi under the impression that Yuuko wants him back; but then finds out too late when Yuuko kills him by literally sucking out his life essence, leaving him as nothing more than a mummified corpse.
name: Taki Shuuichi
